trans-unit.source: Specifies when and how a part will be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 指定何时以及如何实例化部件。

trans-unit.source: In the course of composition, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> needs instances of the objects described by exports in order to fill imports.
trans-unit.target: 在过程中组合，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>需要为了填充导入导出所描述的对象的实例。

trans-unit.source: If a one export is used to fill multiple imports, there are two possible behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个导出用于填充多个导入，有两个可能的行为。

trans-unit.source: Either a single instance of the exported object is created, and a reference to the same object is given to every importer, or a separate instance of the exported object is created for each importer.
trans-unit.target: 创建导出对象的单个实例，并对同一对象的引用赋予每个导入程序，或者为每个导入程序创建的已导出对象的单独实例。

trans-unit.source: Which behavior occurs depends on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute> attached to the export and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.RequiredCreationPolicy%2A> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 发生哪种行为取决于<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute>附加到导出和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.RequiredCreationPolicy%2A>的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Both of which will contain a value from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 这两种将包含一个介于<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy>枚举。

trans-unit.source: If the policies are incompatible, that export will not be considered a match for the given import.
trans-unit.target: 如果策略不兼容，该导出将不被视为给定导入的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the interaction of these two properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表总结了这两个属性的交互。

trans-unit.source: Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies Any or none specified.
trans-unit.target: 导出的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A>指定任何或未指定。

trans-unit.source: Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies Shared
trans-unit.target: 导出的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A>指定共享

trans-unit.source: Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies NonShared
trans-unit.target: 导出的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A>指定 NonShared

trans-unit.source: Any
trans-unit.target: 任意

trans-unit.source: A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
trans-unit.target: 将创建的已导出对象的单个共享实例。

trans-unit.source: A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
trans-unit.target: 将创建的已导出对象的单个共享实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.
trans-unit.target: 将为每个导入程序创建的已导出对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Shared
trans-unit.target: Shared

trans-unit.source: A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
trans-unit.target: 将创建的已导出对象的单个共享实例。

trans-unit.source: A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
trans-unit.target: 将创建的已导出对象的单个共享实例。

trans-unit.source: The export will not be considered a match for the import.
trans-unit.target: 导出将不被视为导入的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: NonShared
trans-unit.target: 非共享

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.
trans-unit.target: 将为每个导入程序创建的已导出对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The export will not be considered a match for the import.
trans-unit.target: 导出将不被视为导入的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.
trans-unit.target: 将为每个导入程序创建的已导出对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> will use the most appropriate <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" /> for the part given the current context.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> 将为部件使用给定当前上下文中最适当的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: This is the default <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> will use <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared" />, unless the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> or importer requests <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，除非 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> 或导入程序请求 <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared" />，否则 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> 将使用 <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a new non-shared instance of the associated <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> will be created by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> for every requestor.
trans-unit.target: 指定将由 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> 为每个请求者创建一个关联的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> 的新的非共享实例。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a single shared instance of the associated <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> will be created by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> and shared by all requestors.
trans-unit.target: 指定将由 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> 创建关联的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> 的单个共享实例，并由所有请求者共享该实例。
